law.catch_line: Referendum on area or statewide basis -- Participation eligibility.
law.text: Any referendum conducted under the provisions of KRS 247.7900 to 247.7928 may be held either on an areawide or statewide basis, as determined by the duly certified association before the referendum is called. The referendum may be participated in by all porcine animal producers, including owners of farms on which porcine animals are produced and tenants sharing in the proceeds of porcine animals. In the referendum, individuals eligible for participation shall vote upon the question of whether or not there shall be levied an assessment in the amount set forth in the call for the referendum.
law.history: Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 2, sec. 5, effective July 13, 2004.
